info.name: JobMela API Collection
info.description: Postman collection for managing Job Melas in the WinVinaya platform. Includes endpoints for creating, listing, viewing, updating, and deleting Job Melas. All write operations require `admin` or `placement` roles. Authenticated users can fetch Job Melas. All endpoints require JWT-based authentication.

request.description:
Creates a new Job Mela record.

**Required fields:**
- `jobmela_name` (string): Name of the job mela event.
- `jobmela_date` (ISO string): Date and time of the job mela, e.g. `2025-07-15T10:00:00`.
- `jobmela_location` (string): Venue or location of the event.
- `jobmela_partner` (string): Partner organization for this job mela.

Requires `admin` or `placement` role. Returns the ID of the created job mela.

Retrieves a list of all job melas in the system.

Returns an array of job mela records, each containing details like name, date, location, partner, created_by, and updated_by.

Fetches a single job mela by its ID.

**URL Parameter:**
- `jobmela_id` (UUID): Unique identifier of the job mela.

Returns detailed information about the job mela, including partner details and audit fields.

Updates details of an existing job mela.

**URL Parameter:**
- `jobmela_id` (UUID): Unique identifier of the job mela to update.

You may provide any subset of the following fields in the body:
- `jobmela_name`
- `jobmela_date` (ISO string)
- `jobmela_location`
- `jobmela_partner`

Requires `admin` or `placement` role.

Deletes a job mela from the system.

**URL Parameter:**
- `jobmela_id` (UUID): ID of the job mela to delete.

Requires `admin` or `placement` role. This action is irreversible.
